argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | uridm.1 | |- H = ( 2nd ` R ) |
| 2 |  | uridm.2 | |- X = ran ( 1st ` R ) |
| 3 |  | uridm.3 | |- U = ( GId ` H ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_rngomndo | |- ( R e. RingOps -> H e. MndOp ) |
| 5 |  | #P_mndomgmid | |- ( H e. MndOp -> H e. ( Magma i^i ExId ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ran H = ran H |
| 7 | 6, 3 | #P_cmpidelt | |- ( ( H e. ( Magma i^i ExId ) /\ A e. ran H ) -> ( ( U H A ) = A /\ ( A H U ) = A ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_ex | |- ( H e. ( Magma i^i ExId ) -> ( A e. ran H -> ( ( U H A ) = A /\ ( A H U ) = A ) ) ) |
| 9 | 4, 5, 8 | #P_3syl | |- ( R e. RingOps -> ( A e. ran H -> ( ( U H A ) = A /\ ( A H U ) = A ) ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1st ` R ) = ( 1st ` R ) |
| 11 | 1, 10 | #P_rngorn1eq | |- ( R e. RingOps -> ran ( 1st ` R ) = ran H ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqtr | |- ( ( X = ran ( 1st ` R ) /\ ran ( 1st ` R ) = ran H ) -> X = ran H ) |
| 13 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( X = ran H /\ R e. RingOps ) -> X = ran H ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( ( X = ran H /\ R e. RingOps ) -> ( A e. X <-> A e. ran H ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_imbi1d | |- ( ( X = ran H /\ R e. RingOps ) -> ( ( A e. X -> ( ( U H A ) = A /\ ( A H U ) = A ) ) <-> ( A e. ran H -> ( ( U H A ) = A /\ ( A H U ) = A ) ) ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_ex | |- ( X = ran H -> ( R e. RingOps -> ( ( A e. X -> ( ( U H A ) = A /\ ( A H U ) = A ) ) <-> ( A e. ran H -> ( ( U H A ) = A /\ ( A H U ) = A ) ) ) ) ) |
| 17 | 12, 16 | #P_syl | |- ( ( X = ran ( 1st ` R ) /\ ran ( 1st ` R ) = ran H ) -> ( R e. RingOps -> ( ( A e. X -> ( ( U H A ) = A /\ ( A H U ) = A ) ) <-> ( A e. ran H -> ( ( U H A ) = A /\ ( A H U ) = A ) ) ) ) ) |
| 18 | 2, 17 | #P_mpan | |- ( ran ( 1st ` R ) = ran H -> ( R e. RingOps -> ( ( A e. X -> ( ( U H A ) = A /\ ( A H U ) = A ) ) <-> ( A e. ran H -> ( ( U H A ) = A /\ ( A H U ) = A ) ) ) ) ) |
| 19 | 11, 18 | #P_mpcom | |- ( R e. RingOps -> ( ( A e. X -> ( ( U H A ) = A /\ ( A H U ) = A ) ) <-> ( A e. ran H -> ( ( U H A ) = A /\ ( A H U ) = A ) ) ) ) |
| 20 | 9, 19 | #P_mpbird | |- ( R e. RingOps -> ( A e. X -> ( ( U H A ) = A /\ ( A H U ) = A ) ) ) |
| 21 | 20 | #P_imp | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( U H A ) = A /\ ( A H U ) = A ) ) |
